Article Status

Source: vignettes/vignette_status.Rmd
vignette_status.Rmd

We use a status system in macpan2 to communicate the maturity of each article to users.

Stable

– Please read! Although mistakes are always possible, so please open an issue if you find any.

Mature Draft

– Should be consistent and accurate, but not yet widely utilized and/or checked for correctness.

Working Draft

– Makes some sense, but could very well be inconsistent or confusing.

Stub

– Do not even bother reading.

On this page
